content.html:
A persistent need in web development is to solve the problem of a footer that’s not at a the foot. A main content area that’s not tall doesn’t push the footer down to the bottom. Here’s one solution, inspired by a request in #IndieWeb chat this morning. It’s on the lab.

Man, I love making web pages.

Meanwhile, in my ears and eyes, music videos

Junior Senior · Move Your Feet

Gorillaz · DARE

Also I made a batch of bone broth

It’s good.

For cooking and such.
